effect.minecraft.absorption.description: Adds some damaging absorbing hearts (which can't be regenerated); higher levels give more absorption.
effect.minecraft.bad_omen.description: Causes an ominous event upon entering a village or the trial chambers; higher levels increase the event difficulty.
effect.minecraft.bad_omen_legacy.descrip: Causes an illager raid to start upon entering a village; higher levels increase the raid difficulty.
effect.minecraft.blindness.description: Impairs vision and disables the ability to sprint and critical hit.
effect.minecraft.conduit_power.descripti: Increases underwater visibility and mining speed, prevents drowning.
effect.minecraft.darkness.description: Adds a pulsating darkening affect to the players screen and pulsating black fog.
effect.minecraft.dolphins_grace.descript: Drastically increases swimming speed. Effect given by dolphins.
effect.minecraft.fire_resistance.descrip: Grants immunity to fire damage as well as damage from lava.
effect.minecraft.glowing.description: Marks affected entities with an outline glow, allowing them to be seen through blocks.
effect.minecraft.haste.description: Increases mining and attack speed; higher levels increase both stats further.
effect.minecraft.health_boost.descriptio: Increases maximum health; higher levels give more additional hearts.
effect.minecraft.hero_of_the_village.des: Gives discounts on trades with villagers, and makes villagers throw items at the player depending on their profession.
effect.minecraft.hunger.description: Increases food exhaustion; higher levels cause to starve quicker.
effect.minecraft.infested.description: Gives affected entities a 10% chance to spawn between 1 and 2 silverfish when hurt.
effect.minecraft.instant_damage.descript: Damages living entities, heals undead; higher levels increase the effect potency.
effect.minecraft.instant_health.descript: Heals living entities, damages undead; higher levels increase the effect potency.
effect.minecraft.invisibility.descriptio: Grants invisibility, making the user invisible and reducing its detection range. Held or worn items will still be visible. Higher levels further decrease the detection range
effect.minecraft.jump_boost.description: Increases jump height and reduces fall damage; higher levels increase both effects.
effect.minecraft.luck.description: Can increase chances of high-quality and more loot; higher levels increase the chances of better loot.
effect.minecraft.mining_fatigue.descript: Decreases mining and attack speed; higher levels decrease both stats further.
effect.minecraft.night_vision.descriptio: Improves vision in dark areas and underwater.
effect.minecraft.oozing.description: Makes affected entities spawn two slimes upon death.
effect.minecraft.poison.description: Inflicts non lethal damage over time; higher levels do more damage per second. Does not affect undeads.
effect.minecraft.raid_omen.description: Starts a raid at the location the effect was gained, once the effect expires. Lasts 30 seconds.
effect.minecraft.regeneration.descriptio: Regenerates health over time; higher levels make health regenerate quicker.
effect.minecraft.slow_falling.descriptio: Decreases falling speed and negates fall damage.
effect.minecraft.slowness.description: Decreases walking speed; higher levels make the user slower and decrease their field of view.
effect.minecraft.speed.description: Increases walking speed; higher levels make the user faster and increase their field of view.
effect.minecraft.strength.description: Increases melee damage; higher levels increase the damage boost power.
effect.minecraft.trial_omen.description: Transforms nearby trial spawners into ominous trial spawners. Last 15 minutes tiles the levels of the original Bad Omen effect.
effect.minecraft.unluck.description: Can reduce chances of high-quality and more loot; higher levels reduce the chance of good loot.
effect.minecraft.water_breathing.descrip: Prevents drowning and allows to breathe underwater.
effect.minecraft.weakness.description: Decreases melee damage; higher levels decrease damage dealt further.
effect.minecraft.weaving.description: Makes affected entities spread cobweb blocks upon death.
effect.minecraft.wind_charged.descriptio: Makes affected entities emit a burst of wind on death.
effect.minecraft.wither.description: Inflicts lethal damage over time; higher levels do more damage per second.
info.emiffect.desc_not_found: The effect appears to have no descriptions...
